title: 08/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - 49ers, Dolphins, Patriots
itunes:title: 08/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - 49ers, Dolphins, Patriots
description:
The quarterback situation for the 49ers is getting more interesting

The Dolphins simply are not special at the QB position

Who should the Patriots start at QB?


Guest: Mike Silver
